text: Brian Weske (23 December 1932–15 October 2001) was a British film and television actor.BFI.org He was born in Stockwell, London, England and died in London, England aged 68. ==Selected filmography== * Medal for the General (1944) * Quiet Weekend (1946) * Fame Is the Spur (1947) * Just William's Luck (1947) * William Comes to Town (1948) * Brandy for the Parson (1952) * No Safety Ahead (1959) * Jungle Street (1960) * Jazz Boat (1960) * On the Fiddle (1961) * Panic (1963) * The Big Switch (1968) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1932 births Category:2001 deaths Category:People from Stockwell Category:English male film actors Category:English male television actors
title: Brian Weske
